Plot:
The wives war is hotter than ever when FCWI (First Class Wife International) and EMWI (Economy Wife International) compete each other to be the one and only wife for their husbands. Here&#039;s Jittra (Nuchsaba Bhunnakan), a first wife who&#039;s suffering from her playboy husband. Her marriage is broken because of Maya (Matinee Kingpoyom), a pretty second wife. Maya is planning to get rid of innocent Jittra to make herself a completed first wife. Invaded by Maya, Jittra tries to be calm, but that&#039;s actually the sign, telling the war is ready to blow up!
